en: If you were diagnosed MIS-C (Multisystem inflammatory syndrome in children) was your last dose of IVIG more than 4 weeks ago ?
CDC recommends vaccination should be deferred for at least 4 weeks after IVIG treatment. Please return after 4 weeks have passed to schedule your vaccine.
Yes, the last dose of IVIG was at least 4 weeks ago
No, the last dose of IVIG was less than 4 weeks ago
sp: ¿Ha recibido anticuerpos monoclonales como parte del tratamiento contra el COVID-19 en los últimos 90 días?
Los Centros para el Control y la Prevención de Enfermedades (CDC) recomiendan que se difiera la vacunación al menos 90 días después del tratamiento con anticuerpos monoclonales.
